game_description: Monkeys! Who doesn't like monkeys! The game The Monke Trials is a game inspired by Gorilla Tag where you can join your monke friends and have fun together and try out different cosmetics! With a locomotion where you move your player around with your hands. Make sure your play space is clear so you don't accidentally hit something!
review_1: This Game Is amazing it has really nice mods and smooth gameplay with epic cosmetics
review_2: Amazing game hope you continue working on it
